Interface Signature.ThrowableSig

All Superinterfaces:
Signature
All Known Subinterfaces:
Signature.ClassTypeSig, Signature.TypeVarSig
Enclosing interface:
Signature
public static sealed interface Signature.ThrowableSig extends Signature permits Signature.ClassTypeSig, Signature.TypeVarSig
Marker interface for a signature for a throwable type.
See Java Language Specification:
8.4.6 Method Throws
See Java Virtual Machine Specification:
4.7.9.1 Signatures
